pageContent: Purpose: We describe the pathological characteristics of recurrence following high intensity focused ultrasound partial ablation in men treated with salvage robot-assisted radical prostatectomy. We assessed the sensitivity of magnetic resonance imaging before salvage robot-assisted radical prostatectomy in these men.

metaData.source:
Cryoablation and high-intensity focused ultrasound
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17432561/
